12.title: Thomas@bedrog.net
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

locations: Stellenbosch, Western Cape, South Africa::(on location)
imdb.plot outline: Tells the story of Thomas and his bosom friends, Hannes, Thabo, Lukas and Lilian Jantjies during their freshman year at Leeukop High School. Thomas is brave, curious and impulsive. He likes rugby, computer games, music and PIZZA. He generally gets along well with his classmates except for De Wet Roux, the school principal's (Eric Nobbs's) son, who continually tries to sabotage his plans. Then there are of course the Marais twins who have more muscles than brain cells and Alexandra (Alex) Louw - the most beautiful girl Thomas ánd Hannes have ever met. Thomas and his friends are a formidable team when it comes to adventures, mystery, plots and unraveling crime. Carina Diedericks-Hugo's award-winning Thomas@ series - published by LAPA Publishers - has already sold 175,000 copies. kykNET and Kokamoya Productions transformed the book series into a television series. Filming took place in Stellenbosch, Western Cape, South Africa.
